bioconda.name: bioconductor-genefu
bioconda.summary: Computation of Gene Expression-Based Signatures in Breast Cancer

biotools.summary: Functions implementing various tasks usually required by gene expression analysis, especially in breast cancer studies: gene mapping between different microarray platforms, identification of molecular subtypes, implementation of published gene signatures, gene selection, and survival analysis.

bioschemas.name: genefu
bioschemas.summary: Functions implementing various tasks usually required by gene expression analysis, especially in breast cancer studies: gene mapping between different microarray platforms, identification of molecular subtypes, implementation of published gene signatures, gene selection, and survival analysis.
